titleInfo.title: Push-to-talk ain't always bad! Comparing Different Interactivity Settings in Task-oriented Dialogue
Proceeding of DECALOG, the 11th International Workshop on the Semantics and Pragmatics of Dialogue (SemDial07)

bibliographicCitation.wels: Fernández, R.; Schlangen, D.; Lucht, T. (2007): Push-to-talk ain't always bad! Comparing Different Interactivity Settings in Task-oriented Dialogue. In: Proceeding of DECALOG, the 11th International Workshop on the Semantics and Pragmatics of Dialogue (SemDial07). Trento, Italy.
